<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  Update code component name by id
</h1>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v2/codecomponents/{id}/updatename"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update code component name by id

## Request
